name: Short_on_Sex_and_Time_by_goopyarts
description:
Modern medicine really is a wonder isn't it?

Our story features Rose and Darren, a young couple more then ready to start a family of their own however, their egg groups don't exactly align. As a result they've started treatment to make themselves more compatible and for lack of a better term; Breedable. Too aroused for their own good; Rose being short on sex, and Darren short on time they find themselves interrupted constantly as they attempt to fuck.

The whole comic can be purchased on my store page with bonus features and extra pages! https://nsfwscaliearts.gumroad.com/l/SoSat

name: A_Bat_Followed_Me_Home
description:
by [[Shane Frost]]

[quote]
Daniel Toke was your average isolated workaholic. That is of course until everything started getting batty after he found a box on the way home. At first it‚Äôs innocent enough a gesture when he finds what looks like a sick bat in the box, but Daniel has started something that he can‚Äôt walk away from. It‚Äôs different, it‚Äôs abnormal, and it‚Äôs hungry. Can Daniel accept the responsibility or did he make a grave mistake?
[/quote]

Would this have been better as a Halloween thing? Yes. Do I care? No.

name: TheShadyDoodles:_The_Pilot_Season
description:
[b]TheShadyDoodles: The Pilot Season[/b] is a series of comic strips written and drawn by artist [b][[TheShadyDoodles]][/b], with help on the English translation provided by "SmashUniverse64":https://www.furaffinity.net/user/smashuniverse64 and "CrazedFoxxo":https://www.furaffinity.net/user/crazedfoxxo. It serves as the introduction to the universe and characters that will be expanded in future comics. While not necessarily canon, many of the events within the pilot season will be carried over into main canon once the series properly begins.

[b]Note from the author:[/b]
This was a series of comic strips that I started publishing on Facebook in 2018. It wasn't planned to follow a story, but starting with #29, the characters started to have a little more complexity, and I discovered that this could be something more than just a Facebook comic strip.

name: On_Borrowed_Time_by_Wooled
description:
[quote]Waves lazily lap the shore, shimmering and reflecting the bubbles that waft across the painted sunset on this cool summer evening. The world seems too still and calm to be dying. But as time itself slows to a standstill from the theft of ancient relics, life is leeching away from the once vibrant lands.

Enter Malachi, a partially evolved Shinx appointed by the mysterious "Maelstrom" as her champion. Problem is, neither of them quite know what has to be done to save the world. Matters are only complicated when an amnesiac Alolan Vulpix washes ashore with her own mysteries to solve. As our heroes meet new friends and foes alike, they find that they may be involved in something much greater, much larger, and much more sinister than any of them bargained for.[/quote]

A PMD comic based off of a Nuzlocke playthrough of Pokemon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky!

Quick Navigation:

name: Disnemon
description:
A long-running series that fuses two beloved franchises together; Disney x Pok√©mon. Where Disney's animated films are recreated with Pok√©mon and Pok√©mon characters. It only features their mainline films and certain animated Disneytoon films.
The film's physical covers are the focus basing the artwork on the VHS, DVD, or Blu-Ray cover depending on when the film was originally released physically.

name: Passive_Death_Wish
description:
Passive Death Wish: a state of mind characterized by thinking about dying or a desire to be dead, without actively making a specific plan to carry out those thoughts.

Warning : This story contain Dark Humor, Fantasy Violence , Suicidal Ideation, Self-harm, Inner Conflict, Death and Drama. Readers are advised to determine if this is right for them.

Warning : The art is a mirror into the artist's mind. The mirror is fragile. Please handle with care.
